markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 12+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Peachwood Weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1543)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 20</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** varies by weapon

**Bulk**  varies by weapon
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

**Base Material** [Peachwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1541)

</column>

---

Peachwood weapons have a particularly auburn tinge to them when under direct sunlight. Peachwood is treated as [darkwood](/Equipment.aspx?ID=376) for any [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creatures' resistances or weaknesses related to darkwood (allowing a peachwood weapon to bypass a [jiang-shi's](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=286) resistance, for example). In addition, peachwood weapons bypass a small portion of the resistances of any undead creature. Strikes with a peachwood weapon treat an undead's resistances against physical damage as 2 lower for standard-grade peachwood, and 4 lower for high-grade.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Peachwood Weapon (Standard-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 20</row>

**Price** 2,000 gp (+200 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** At least 250 gp of peachwood + 25 gp per Bulk

<title
level="2"
right="Item 18"
pfs="Standard"
>
Peachwood Weapon (High-Grade)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 20</row>

**Price** 19,000 gp (+1,900 gp per Bulk)

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

**Craft Requirements** At least 9,500 gp of peachwood + 950 gp per Bulk
name: Peachwood Weapon (Standard-Grade)
